successes.title: Planet Mercenary
successes.description: A tabletop RPG by Alan Bahr and Howard Tayler, and set in the Space Opera universe of SCHLOCK MERCENARY

Pledges.description:
FORWARD OBSERVER
You have our thanks! Also, as a backer of the project you will be party to all backer emails, and you will have the option to pick up project rewards at "Add-On" prices after the project has funded.
(Rewards purchased by FORWARD OBSERVERS will be delivered on the schedule used by the tiers for those rewards.)

AIR-DROPPED GRUNT
You get full-color PDFs of both the PLANET MERCENARY core book and the associated card deck.
If shelf space is at a premium, and shipping is problematic, this is the option for you.

You're just here for the Maxims. You get Commodore Karl Tagon's personal copy of THE SEVENTY MAXIMS OF MAXIMALLY EFFECTIVE MERCENARIES. This 80 page hardback features all seventy maxims, editorial commentary, and handwritten notes in the margins.

You're just here for the Maxims. You get Commodore Karl Tagon's personal copy of THE SEVENTY MAXIMS OF MAXIMALLY EFFECTIVE MERCENARIES. This 80 page hardback features all seventy maxims, editorial commentary, and handwritten notes in the margins.

You're just here for the Maxims. You get Commodore Karl Tagon's personal copy of THE SEVENTY MAXIMS OF MAXIMALLY EFFECTIVE MERCENARIES. This 80 page hardback features all seventy maxims, editorial commentary, and handwritten notes in the margins.
You get the hard copy of Commodore Karl Tagon's personal copy of THE SEVENTY MAXIMS OF MAXIMALLY EFFECTIVE MERCENARIES.
You also get full-color PDFs of the PLANET MERCENARY core book and the associated card deck.
SEVENTY MAXIMS book with an AIR DROP
